Desc.entry: Aims to promote and develop field hockey in schools and clubs throughout South Yorkshire. Seeks to increase opportunities for children aged 4-18 years to experience the sport and to provide pathways into club hockey. Works closely with the 4 local authorities in South Yorkshire and several local hockey clubs. Has several hockey teams where young people play hockey at representational level, in accordance with England Hockey's structure for providing pathways to higher representative play. Also provides information on courses related to the sport including, coaching, umpiring, first aid etc.
